movePointOnCircleOrGraph.value: Move Point on Circle or Graph

accessibleHelpText.value: Expand to explore graph of function versus angle.
Expand to show angle measure, coordinates, and trig value.
Compare values and graphs of different trig functions.
Move point clockwise or counterclockwise to change theta.
Move point on graph to change theta.

left.value: Point off screen to the left!

right.value: Point off screen to the right!

accessibleHelpText.value: Explore with or without constrained angles.
Explore angles with or without help of visual labels on unit circle and graph.
Create angles with or without help of coordinate grid on unit circle.

playArea.value: An interactive circle with a radius of 1 is centered on a coordinate plane. A movable point on the circle defines an angle theta as the point is rotated counterclockwise or clockwise from the x-axis. A right triangle forms between the radius, the x-axis, and a vertical line from the point to the x-axis. The selected trigonometric function highlights the corresponding side or sides of the triangle being explored inside the circle. Below the circle, a collapsible graph plots the selected function versus theta. The graph has a corresponding movable point which can go off screen.

controlArea.value: Use special angles, labels, and background grid, as needed, to guide your exploration of trigonometric functions. Reset the sim to start over.

quadrantInfoPattern.value: Point on circle is in quadrant {{n}}.

pointOnXAxis.value: Point on circle is on the x-axis.

pointOnYAxis.value: Point on circle is on the y-axis.

clockwiseAngle.value: A clockwise rotation of point on circle forms angle theta.

counterClockwiseAngle.value: A counterclockwise rotation of point on circle forms angle theta.

valuesDescriptionPattern.value: The angle is {{angle}}. For this angle, x equals {{xValue}}; y equals {{yValue}}; {{trigFunction}} equals {{trigValue}}.

interactionHint.value: Move point on circle or graph to explore different angles.
